document.full_text: singer lady gaga may be recognized by most for her provocative outfits and wild shows, but she can school corporations in strategic innovation, a german business researcher told reuters on wednesday.
document.title: old ceos can learn a few new tricks from lady gaga
lines_and_colors: singer lady gaga may be recognized by most for her provocative outfits and wild shows, but she can school corporations in strategic innovation, a german business researcher told reuters on wednesday.
